artist: Designer: Félix Bracquemond; Manufacturer: Lebeuf, Milliet & Co., Creil; Retailer: Francois-Eugene Rousseau
creditline: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Gabriel P. Weisberg
description: cake plate with white ground and brushed blue pigment around edge of plate and foot with painted fish seen from below, orange butterfly and a beetle on plate surface and a pink flower bud, a bee and snail on foot
title: Cake plate with fish, butterfly, and bug
